title: I'm seventeen, I'm pregnant and I don't know what to do
creator_credit: Lee Mendelson Film Productions and David Crommie
brief_description: Dramatizes the plight of an unwed pregnant adolescent. With her parents, social workers and a discussion group at the Children’s Home Society of California, she considers the alternatives of abortion, forced marriage, temporary foster care, keeping the baby or relinquishing it for adoption.
